TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormViewInsertedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的 "插入" 按钮 (其`CommandName`属性设置为 "插入") 时, 控件引发事件, 但在控件插入记录后。 The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法, 该方法执行自定义例程, 如在此事件发生时检查插入操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an insert operation, whenever this event occurs. 对象将传递到事件处理方法, 该方法允许你确定受影响的记录数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受插入操作影响的记录数, 请使用属性。To determine the number of records affected by the insert operation, use the property. 使用属性可确定是否发生了异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 还可以通过设置属性, 指示是否已在事件处理方法中处理异常。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果需要访问插入记录的值, 请使用属性。If you need to access the values of the inserted record, use the property. 默认情况下, 该控件返回到插入操作后由属性指定的模式。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an insert operation. 如果在插入操作过程中发生异常, 则可以通过 将属性设置为来`true`使控件保持在插入模式下。If an exception occurs during the insert operation, you can keep the control in insert mode by setting the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用传递给事件的事件处理方法的对象来确定是否在插入操作过程中发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an insert operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框, 该文本框接受用户输入, 这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 对象，表示执行插入操作时引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception raised when the insert operation was performed.

param.span: 如果未引发异常，则将 用于此参数。

span.span: If no exception was raised, use for this parameter.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||参数中包含的对象 `e` 。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取受插入操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the insert operation.

value.span: 受插入操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可确定受插入操作影响的记录数。Use the property to determine the number of records affected by the insert operation. 此属性通常用于验证是否在下列情况下插入了正确的记录数:This property is commonly used to verify that the correct number of records was inserted in the following situations: - 验证是否只插入了一条记录。Verify that only a single record was inserted. 有时, 编写不当的 insert 语句可能会插入多个记录。Sometimes an improperly written insert statement can insert multiple records. - 验证在不引发异常的插入操作过程中发生错误时是否插入了记录。Verify that a record was inserted when an error occurs during the insert operation that does not raise an exception. - 验证在支持冲突检测 (乐观并发) 的数据源控件 ( 如和控件) 的数据源控件将`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`其属性设置为枚举值时插入的记录。Verify that a record was inserted when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency), such as the and controls, has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 在此设置下, 可能无法插入与其他用户并发具有相同键值的记录。Under this setting, a record that has the same key value as a record by another user concurrently might not be inserted. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来验证是否在插入操作过程中插入了记录。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to verify that a record was inserted during the insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取插入操作过程中引发的异常（如果引发）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示插入操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was raised during the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可确定在插入操作过程中引发的异常 (如果有)。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常, 并且您决定在事件处理程序中处理异常, 请确保将属性设置为`true`; 否则, 控件将重新引发异常。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否在插入操作过程中引发了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception was raised during an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在插入操作过程中所引发的异常是否已在事件处理程序中得到处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the insert operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在插入操作过程中引发异常时, 请使用属性指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。When an exception is raised during the insert operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 如果将此属性设置为`true`, 则异常被视为已处理并且不会重新引发。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown. 如果将此属性设置为`false`, 则控件将重新引发异常。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要确定引发的异常, 请使用属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指示在事件处理程序中已处理异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepInInsertMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在插入操作完成后 控件是否仍保持插入模式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation.

value.span: 如果在插入操作完成后仍保持插入模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to remain in insert mode after an insert operation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 该控件返回到属性指定的模式。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property. 使用属性指定控件是否应在插入操作后保持在插入模式下。 Use the property to specify whether the control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation. 若要使控件保持在插入模式下, 请将`true`此属性设置为。To keep the control in insert mode, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅在发生某种情况 (如引发的异常) 时才应使用, 此类要求控件的行为方式与正常情况不同。This property should be used only when a situation occurs (such as an exception being raised) that requires the control to behave differently than it normally would. 如果控件在默认情况下需要保持在插入模式下, 请改为设置属性。 If the control needs to remain in insert mode by default, set the property instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性在插入操作过程中发生异常时, 将控件保持在插入模式下。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to keep the control in insert mode when an exception occurs during an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取包含已插入记录所对应的字段名/值对的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

value.span: 一个含有字典的 对象，其中包含已插入记录所对应的键字段名称/值对。

span.span: An object that contains a dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可访问已插入记录的字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the fields for the inserted record. 例如, 您可以使用这些值来保存插入记录的日志。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of inserted records. 属性返回实现接口的对象。 The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示插入记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the inserted record. 若要访问字段名称, 请使用 对象的属性。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同样, 可以使用属性访问字段值。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 作为一种快捷方式, 还可以使用对象的索引器直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 使用索引器的优点是它直接返回字段值。The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly. 依赖于字段顺序的数据源控件 (如) 只能通过索引访问字段值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问集合中的项。The following example demonstrates how to iterate through the items in the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgsValues#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgsValues/CS/formviewinsertedeventargsvaluescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgsValues#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgsValues/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvaluesvb.aspx#1)]
